page.topic: How do I customize the list of forms in the Alpha TransForm app to display additional information, such as an inspection location or client's phone number?
page.description: Form listings in Alpha TransForm can be customized to display data from the form.

description.p: Open the Designer tab and select the Form Type to customize. In the Advanced Features section, edit the Heading Template to customize the forms list in the TransForm App and edit the Listing Template to customize the forms list in the Management Console.
Your template can reference data in the fields of the form using the *[tpl:{#fieldname}]* placeholder. For example:
For more information, see the [Heading Template] and [Listing Template] documentation.
